nodes.text: Sallowpink was a B2-series super battle droid manufactured by Baktoid Combat Automata that was enhanced with a variety of additional gray armor plating across its body and spikes along its arms. Between 10 BBY and 3 ABY, the droid was planned to participate as a gladiator droid in a Pit Fight Night at Grakkus Arena on the moon Nar Shaddaa.

A draft advertisement for the event presented to the arena's owner Grakkus Jahibakti Tingi for approval listed the night's main event as a battle between Sallowpink and the gladiator droid Rheen the Powderizer where all weapon mods were legal.
Sallowpink was first mentioned in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide, which was written by Daniel Wallace with an illustration of Sallowpink by Adrián Rodriguez.
